item.title: How to Code Christmas Tree LEDs (and find their 3D Coordinates)
item.description: For the Christmas of 2021, I decided to make our Christmas tree lights incredibly complex so that I could marvel at my own animations running on them. That’s tongue and cheek, but also ended up being very true. I’d been inspired by mathematician Matt Parker in 2020 where he did this. In this post I’ll describe all the hardware I used and how it was connected and I’ll share the code I needed to write to capture the LED’s coordinates.
